Some studies have reported that a small percentage of people with hypochondroplasia have mild to moderate intellectual disability or learning problems, but other studies have produced conflicting results.",GHR,hypochondroplasia
How many people are affected by hypochondroplasia ?,"The incidence of hypochondroplasia is unknown. Researche
